id: scenario-value-scanner-student-scenarios-family-siblings learning from student care economy practices
title: Siblings learning from student care economy practices
description: Siblings learning from student care economy practices
content:
Scenario: Siblings learning from student care economy practices
    Given Kenji has younger siblings who will become students
    And he's learning valuable care economy skills
    When the family_elohim tracks knowledge transfer
    Then it should recognize Kenji mentoring siblings in life skills
    And it should value his teaching them budgeting, cooking, household management
    And it should accumulate care tokens for mentorship work
    And older siblings should be recognized as teachers for younger ones
    And the system should value peer education within families
    And Kenji's student experience should benefit future student siblings
